name: Defence Lines
description:
How long can you defend yourself from a legion of laser tanks. Use SPACEBAR to drop worker drones on cable points. These drones will drive along towards nearby turrets and connect them to your power grid. Drones can also attack enemies, these kills have a 100% turret spawn rate.

Point where you want it to go, then press space to drop a worker drone. The drone will expire after a short amount of time and it will be given back to you.

Credits:

(Panda) Alexandra Stephens - Game Programming

(Depressito) Yan Nekola - Game Programming

(Kastor) Jonathan Weston - Level Design, Audio, Programming.

(Chewy) Adriaan Bakker - Modelling, Level Design, Programming.

Created during Global Game Jam 2023

https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/defence-lines-0
